project.name: devrel
project.description: The developer relations Project is an effort to recruit, train, and manage developers for Gentoo's development structure.

longdescription.p: Developer relations handles many personnel-related tasks, such as adding and removing developers, solving conflicts, and providing a contact point for prospective and current developers.

goals.p: The stated goal for developer relations is to act as a meeting point for Gentoo developers and advanced users both. As such, developer relations is concerned with both intra-developer relations as well as forming relations with advanced users and prospective developers.

extraproject.name: Policy
extraproject.p: Policy guide for conflict resolution and other developer relations issues.
